name: 3 (lavaduder)
description:
Made for https://itch.io/jam/christmas-break-jam

Completely made with Free and Open Source Software.

Art Done with:https://www.gimp.org/

Music Done with:https://musescore.org/en

Lastly Using Game Engine:https://godotengine.org/

Each one of these require no payments, and can directly download the source code.

This game is MIT, so feel free to use any part of it for your own purpose.

Controls

wasd to move 

Enter to continue conversation.

For the wire puzzle. 

    To move a box click and drag.

    Click on a small circle (terminal) and drag to form a wire, drag and let go on a circle to form a connection. When you are ready, press the on switch on the power box
